project.name: J-C253A-ELAS-03-ST01-DT01-DF11-CF04-01
project.description: This test gets the index of the character . in the input string. It then uses that index to get a substring beginning with . If . does not occur in the string, the index will be -1, and then the substring operation will fail with an IndexOutOfBounds exception.

process.environment_variable: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
